mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(title, created_time, content, public_auth, isPublic, user_id) VALUES(#{title}, #{createdTime}, #{content}, #{publicAuth},#{isPublic}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.title, b.created_time, b.updated_time, b.content, b.public_auth, b.isPublic, b.user_id FROM board b LEFT OUTER JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE u.email = #{value} ORDER BY created_time DESC
